title: Brexit and American independence
itunes:title: Brexit and American independence
itunes:subtitle: Historian Tom Cutterham compares the ongoing negotiations to take Britain out of the EU with those of the 1780s when the United States departed from the British empire.
description:
Historian Tom Cutterham compares the ongoing negotiations to take Britain out of the EU with those of the 1780s when the United States departed from the British empire.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
